ev3dev.hardware

Class EV3DevDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • ev3dev.hardware.Device
      • ev3dev.hardware.EV3DevDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SupportedPlatform, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Battery, EV3DevMotorDevice, EV3DevSensorDevice, PlatformTest, Sound

    public abstract class EV3DevDevice
extends Device
implements SupportedPlatform
    This class been designed to discover if the library is used in: - EV3 Brick - Raspberry Pi 1 + PiStorms - Raspberry Pi 1 + BrickPi
